report.title: Legal Fun
report.author: bsflip
report.bodytext: I read up on the subsatance kava on this very website, i am not about to become sucked into mainstream illegal drugs and i was looking for a way to be relaxed and feel and see wonderful things in a legal way. After reading the tesimonials i decided to give kava a try. my first few times the pills didnt do much but slightly relax me. lately i decided to up the dose and see if, like cannabis, it would work after a few goes at the drug. WOW! it is unreal. heres what i experienced... /n /n [8 180mg caps of 55% kavalactone and 4 400mg caps of 2.5% kavalactones] /n /n Pros: /n state of utter realaxation /n heavy legs, [urge to rest and let go] /n vision sharply focuses then unfocuses /n vision blurs as u move or others move quickly, /n when u steady a cool drifty state takes control of u for a few seconds. /n lights and colors pop out and seem intriguing /n you feel like u are moving when u aren't. /n everything seems good /n music is elegant and flowing /n overall it is a wonderful experience /n /n Cons: /n slight nausea
